description: The main focus of this module is the completion of a second project of community outreach. The project should in some way be connected to the studentâ€™s future goals beyond graduation. The student(s) enrolled will develop the project and therefore will be unique by design. Students will identify a faculty mentor to guide them in the project production.
title: Career Development Independent Project 2
prerequisite: Musical Pathways, Leading and Guiding, Career development independent or Career development group project, Approval of project proposal by Professional Integration faculty committee
